sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { BrowserRouter as Router, Routes, Route, Link, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom';
import { ThemeProvider, createTheme } from '@mui/material/styles';
import CssBaseline from '@mui/material/CssBaseline';
import {
  AppBar,
  Toolbar,
  Typography,
  Container,
  Box,
  Tabs,
  Tab,
  Card,
  CardContent,
  Grid,
  Button
} from '@mui/material';
import {
  Dashboard as DashboardIcon,
  CloudUpload,
  Security,
  Code,
  Home
} from '@mui/icons-material';

import LogUpload from './components/LogUpload';
import RuleManagement from './components/RuleManagement';
import IaCScanner from './components/IaCScanner';

const theme = createTheme({
  palette: {
    mode: 'light',
    primary: {
      main: '#1976d2',
    },
    secondary: {
      main: '#dc004e',
    },
  },
});

function Navigation() {
  const location = useLocation();
  const currentPath = location.pathname;

  const getTabValue = () => {
    switch (currentPath) {
      case '/':
        return 0;
      case '/logs':
        return 1;
      case '/rules':
        return 2;
      case '/scanner':
        return 3;
      default:
        return 0;
    }
  };

  return (
    <Box sx={{ borderBottom: 1, borderColor: 'divider', bgcolor: 'background.paper' }}>
      <Container maxWidth="lg">
        <Tabs value={getTabValue()} aria-label="navigation tabs">
          <Tab
            icon={<Home />}
            label="Dashboard"
            component={Link}
            to="/"
          />
          <Tab
            icon={<CloudUpload />}
            label="Log Analysis"
            component={Link}
            to="/logs"
          />
          <Tab
            icon={<Security />}
            label="Rule Management"
            component={Link}
            to="/rules"
          />
          <Tab
            icon={<Code />}
            label="IaC Scanner"
            component={Link}
            to="/scanner"
          />
        </Tabs>
      </Container>
    </Box>
  );
}

function Dashboard() {
  return (
    <Box>
      <Typography variant="h4" gutterBottom>
        Securon Platform Dashboard
      </Typography>
      <Typography variant="body1" paragraph>
        Welcome to the Securon Platform - a comprehensive cloud security solution that combines 
        Infrastructure-as-Code scanning with machine learning-based runtime behavior analysis.
      </Typography>

      <Grid container spacing={3} sx={{ mt: 2 }}>
        <Grid item xs={12} md={4}>
          <Card>
            <CardContent>
              <Box display="flex" alignItems="center" gap={2} mb={2}>
                <CloudUpload color="primary" />
                <Typography variant="h6">Log Analysis</Typography>
              </Box>
              <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary" paragraph>
                Upload and analyze cloud logs (VPC Flow, CloudTrail, IAM) to detect anomalous 
                patterns using machine learning.
              </Typography>
              <Button
                variant="contained"
                component={Link}
                to="/logs"
                fullWidth
              >
                Upload Logs
              </Button>
            </CardContent>
          </Card>
        </Grid>

        <Grid item xs={12} md={4}>
          <Card>
            <CardContent>
              <Box display="flex" alignItems="center" gap={2} mb={2}>
                <Security color="primary" />
                <Typography variant="h6">Rule Management</Typography>
              </Box>
              <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary" paragraph>
                Review and manage security rules generated from ML findings. Approve or reject 
                candidate rules for enforcement.
              </Typography>
              <Button
                variant="contained"
                component={Link}
                to="/rules"
                fullWidth
              >
                Manage Rules
              </Button>
            </CardContent>
          </Card>
        </Grid>

        <Grid item xs={12} md={4}>
          <Card>
            <CardContent>
              <Box display="flex" alignItems="center" gap={2} mb={2}>
                <Code color="primary" />
                <Typography variant="h6">IaC Scanner</Typography>
              </Box>
              <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary" paragraph>
                Scan Terraform code for security misconfigurations using both built-in and 
                ML-generated rules.
              </Typography>
              <Button
                variant="contained"
                component={Link}
                to="/scanner"
                fullWidth
              >
                Scan Code
              </Button>
            </CardContent>
          </Card>
        </Grid>
      </Grid>

      <Box sx={{ mt: 4 }}>
        <Typography variant="h5" gutterBottom>
          How It Works
        </Typography>
        <Grid container spacing={2}>
          <Grid item xs={12} md={3}>
            <Box textAlign="center" p={2}>
              <CloudUpload sx={{ fontSize: 48, color: 'primary.main', mb: 1 }} />
              <Typography variant="h6" gutterBottom>
                1. Upload Logs
              </Typography>
              <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
                Upload cloud logs for ML analysis and anomaly detection
              </Typography>
            </Box>
          </Grid>
          <Grid item xs={12} md={3}>
            <Box textAlign="center" p={2}>
              <Box sx={{ fontSize: 48, color: 'primary.main', mb: 1 }}>
                <DashboardIcon fontSize="inherit" />
              </Box>
              <Typography variant="h6" gutterBottom>
                2. ML Analysis
              </Typography>
              <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
                Isolation Forest algorithm detects anomalous patterns and generates candidate rules
              </Typography>
            </Box>
          </Grid>
          <Grid item xs={12} md={3}>
            <Box textAlign="center" p={2}>
              <Security sx={{ fontSize: 48, color: 'primary.main', mb: 1 }} />
              <Typography variant="h6" gutterBottom>
                3. Rule Approval
              </Typography>
              <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
                Review and approve candidate rules for enforcement in IaC scanning
              </Typography>
            </Box>
          </Grid>
          <Grid item xs={12} md={3}>
            <Box textAlign="center" p={2}>
              <Code sx={{ fontSize: 48, color: 'primary.main', mb: 1 }} />
              <Typography variant="h6" gutterBottom>
                4. IaC Scanning
              </Typography>
              <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
                Scan Terraform code with approved rules to prevent security misconfigurations
              </Typography>
            </Box>
          </Grid>
        </Grid>
      </Box>
    </Box>
  );
}

function App() {
  return (
    <ThemeProvider theme={theme}>
      <CssBaseline />
      <Router>
        <AppBar position="static">
          <Toolbar>
            <Typography variant="h6" component="div" sx={{ flexGrow: 1 }}>
              Securon Platform
            </Typography>
          </Toolbar>
        </AppBar>
        
        <Navigation />
        
        <Container maxWidth="lg" sx={{ mt: 4, mb: 4 }}>
          <Routes>
            <Route path="/" element={<Dashboard />} />
            <Route path="/logs" element={<LogUpload />} />
            <Route path="/rules" element={<RuleManagement />} />
            <Route path="/scanner" element={<IaCScanner />} />
          </Routes>
        </Container>
      </Router>
    </ThemeProvider>
  );
}

export default App;
